definition: Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja
Yama/gate of village/surname Yan
gauze/to collect/to gather/to catch/to sift
surname Luo
Yama, King of Hell/translation of Sanskrit: Yama Raja

sentences.english: Yama's image developed in Tang and the following Five Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐五代時期是閻羅王形象的最重要的衍化期。

sentences.english: Well, they didn't drag him off to have tea with King Yama.
sentences.chinese: 於是就沒有抓他到閻羅王那兒去喝茶。

sentences.english: So, you can see many ox- faces working for the King of Hell.
sentences.chinese: 咁所以幫閻羅王打工個喳都系牛頭多過馬面。

sentences.english: In the chamber of the Lord of Death, you will have to make repayment with your own flesh and blood. Do you know that?
sentences.chinese: 在閻羅殿裏，就必將會用自己的血肉償還，您知道嗎？

sentences.english: You know, of course, that King Yama also enjoys a good cup of tea.
sentences.chinese: 因爲閻羅王也好喝茶，你們知道嗎？

sentences.english: Ding was wounded in Yama, Zhao day ask him to save a mountain.
sentences.chinese: 丁日被閻羅王打傷，遇兆天時求他救一山。

sentences.english: The King of Hell occupies northeast fertile burnt stone under of scream the earth jail.
sentences.chinese: 閻羅王佔據東北方沃焦石下的叫喚大地獄。
